ovdesc.p: This file contains the list of Standalone DD's that are scheduled for a date for each DD.PARAMETER ID. This file is updated when a DD.STANDALONE is added or modified and this file is referred to create DD.ITEM & STMT.ENTRY on the scheduled date.
All updates to this file are effected automatically by the system and the only functions users are allowed to perform are (L)IST, (S)EE and (P)RINT.

desc.p: This contains the ID of the DD.STANDALONE.FQU.LIST entry.
The format is DD.PARAMETER id "-" Value Date of DD.ITEM
Contains the Id of the DD.STANDALONE record which is to be processed on the Value date for the given Parameter id.
